content.html: If you believe this, I hope you never reproduce. Strong women are dope. So are nurturing loving fathers and people in solid relationships with a nuanced dynamics. Men in the “Mano sphere” are silly small-dick energy boys with outdated ideas. This shit makes you look ignorant.
